content:
TITLE: Running Development Server - Shell
DESCRIPTION: These commands are used to set up and run the development server for the Clash Verge Rev project. It assumes that all the prerequisites for Tauri are already installed. The first command installs the dependencies, the second command checks the code, and the third command starts the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm i
pnpm run check
pnpm dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Install Project Dependencies with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: This command installs all the necessary project dependencies using the PNPM package manager. This command reads the `package.json` file in the current directory and installs the packages specified in the dependencies section.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Install PNPM Globally
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the PNPM package manager globally using NPM. PNPM is used for managing project dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install pnpm -g
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Build Project with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: This command builds the project for production using PNPM. This generates optimized and minified code for deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Run Development Server
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server using PNPM.  `pnpm dev` starts the standard development server. `pnpm dev:diff` is used if another instance is already running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm dev
# If an app instance already exists, use a different command
pnpm dev:diff
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Rust Toolchain for Windows MSVC
DESCRIPTION: These commands configure the Rust toolchain to use the Windows MSVC ABI. This is necessary for compatibility with certain Windows libraries and tools.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
rustup target add x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
rustup set default-host x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fast Build Project with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: This command performs a faster build of the project using PNPM. It disables optimizations for quicker build times, suitable for development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm build:fast
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Run Check Script
DESCRIPTION: This command executes the check script defined in `package.json`. It typically downloads or updates the Mihomo core binary.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm run check
# Use '--force' to force update to the latest version
# pnpm run check --force
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Clean Rust Build with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: This command cleans the Rust build artifacts using PNPM. This is used to remove previously built files before a fresh build.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm clean
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Package Portable Version with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: This command packages the project into a portable version for Windows using PNPM. This creates a self-contained executable that can be run without installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm portable
```
